trans-unit.source: Represents an interoperable binding that supports distributed transactions and secure, reliable sessions.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma associação interoperável que oferece suporte a transações distribuídas e sessões, seguras e confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: The WSHttpBinding is similar to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding> but provides more Web service features.
trans-unit.target: O WSHttpBinding é semelhante do <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>, mas fornece mais recursos de serviço da Web.</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: It uses the HTTP transport and provides message security, as does <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>, but it also provides transactions, reliable messaging, and WS-Addressing, either enabled by default or available through a single control setting.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa o transporte HTTP e fornece segurança de mensagem, como o <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>, mas ele também fornece transações, sistema de mensagens confiável e WS-Addressing, habilitado por padrão ou disponível por meio de uma configuração de controle único.</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo de segurança usado pela associação especificado.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>que especifica o tipo de segurança que é usada com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> class with a binding specified by its configuration name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com uma associação especificada por seu nome de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The binding configuration name for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome da configuração de associação para o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpBindingElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The binding element with the name configName was not found.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de associação com o nome configName não foi encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> class with a specified type of security used by the binding and a value that indicates whether a reliable session is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> classe com um tipo específico de segurança usado pela associação e um valor que indica se uma sessão confiável está habilitada.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode> that specifies the type of security that is used with the SOAP message and for the client.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>que especifica o tipo de segurança que é usada com a mensagem SOAP e para o cliente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a reliable session is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se uma sessão confiável está ativada. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the WCF client will automatically store and resend any cookies sent by a single web service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o cliente WCF armazenará automaticamente e enviar novamente qualquer cookie enviado por um serviço web simples.

trans-unit.source: Setting AllowCookies to `true` is useful when a client is interacting with one web service that uses cookies.
trans-unit.target: Definindo AllowCookies como `true` é útil quando um cliente está interagindo com um serviço web que usa cookies.

trans-unit.source: If you are accessing multiple services with the same cookie, set AllowCookies to `false` and you will have to manually add the cookie header to each outgoing message.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver acessando vários serviços com o mesmo cookie, definir AllowCookies como `false` e você terá que adicionar manualmente o cabeçalho do cookie para cada mensagem de saída.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to do this: ```c# MyWebServiceClient client = new MyWebServiceClient(); using (new OperationContextScope(client.InnerChannel)) { client.DoSomething(); // Extract the cookie embedded in the received web service response // and stores it locally HttpResponseMessageProperty response = (HttpResponseMessageProperty) OperationContext.Current.IncomingMessageProperties[ HttpResponseMessageProperty.Name]; sharedCookie = response.Headers["Set-Cookie"]; } MyOtherWebServiceClient otherClient = new MyOtherWebServiceClient(); using (new OperationContextScope(otherClient.InnerChannel)) { // Embeds the extracted cookie in the next web service request // Note that we manually have to create the request object since // since it doesn't exist yet at this stage HttpRequestMessageProperty request = new HttpRequestMessageProperty(); request.Headers["Cookie"] = sharedCookie; OperationContext.Current.OutgoingMessageProperties[ HttpRequestMessageProperty.Name] = request; otherClient.DoSomethingElse(); } ```
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir mostra como fazer isso:```c# MyWebServiceClient client = new MyWebServiceClient(); using (new OperationContextScope(client.InnerChannel)) { client.DoSomething(); // Extract the cookie embedded in the received web service response // and stores it locally HttpResponseMessageProperty response = (HttpResponseMessageProperty) OperationContext.Current.IncomingMessageProperties[ HttpResponseMessageProperty.Name]; sharedCookie = response.Headers["Set-Cookie"]; } MyOtherWebServiceClient otherClient = new MyOtherWebServiceClient(); using (new OperationContextScope(otherClient.InnerChannel)) { // Embeds the extracted cookie in the next web service request // Note that we manually have to create the request object since // since it doesn't exist yet at this stage HttpRequestMessageProperty request = new HttpRequestMessageProperty(); request.Headers["Cookie"] = sharedCookie; OperationContext.Current.OutgoingMessageProperties[ HttpRequestMessageProperty.Name] = request; otherClient.DoSomethingElse(); } ```

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if automatic cookies processing is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Se os cookies automático de processamento é obrigatória. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered collection of binding elements contained in the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção ordenada de elementos contidos na associação atual de associação.

trans-unit.source: The order of the binding elements is important.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos elementos de associação é importante.

trans-unit.source: It reflects the order in which the protocol and transport channels are constructed and stacked.
trans-unit.target: Ela reflete a ordem na qual os canais de transporte e de protocolo são construídos e empilhados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> that contains the ordered stack of binding elements described by the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref> binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>que contém a pilha ordenada de elementos descritos por de associação a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"> </xref> associação.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: The transport security mode set cannot provide the reliable session that has been enabled.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de modo de segurança de transporte não pode fornecer a sessão confiável foi habilitada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the security binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o elemento de associação de segurança da associação atual.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>da associação atual.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Returns the transport binding element from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o elemento de associação de transporte de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> from the current binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>da associação atual.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the security settings used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de segurança usadas com essa associação.

trans-unit.source: To use something other than the default security type, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para usar algo que não seja o tipo de segurança padrão, use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode%29>construtor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity"></xref> that is used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity"> </xref> que é usado com essa associação.

trans-unit.source: The default value <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode*> property is <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão <> </> *> é de propriedade <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*>propriedade foi alterado do valor padrão e deve ser serializada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*>o valor da propriedade deve ser serializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding.Security*>
